organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Criteria are established in this standard for variable selection, performance, design, and qualification of accident monitoring instrumentation, and include requirements for display alternatives for accident monitoring instrumentation, documentation of design bases, and use of portable instrumentation.
